briefdescription.para: Update classifier parameters (e.g., if graphics have moved). N.b., this is done separately from updateEvidence because we want to update the GUI regularly even if the classifier isn't being refreshed.
Update evidence in favour of each alternative / classification hypothesis.
Return the object at index i. Each object is a possible area of interest.
Refresh any associated GUI window.
Reset the classifier; clear buffers and graphics.
GETDATA dfdfdf.
Visualise classifier on a PTB OpenGL screen (e.g., draw a hit-box rectangle around the graphic).

memberdef.argsstring: (matlabtypesubstitute graphicObjsOrNAlternatives, matlabtypesubstitute criterion, matlabtypesubstitute timeout, matlabtypesubstitute bufferLength, matlabtypesubstitute onsetRampStart, matlabtypesubstitute onsetRampDuration)
memberdef.name: IvClassifier

briefdescription.para: IvClassifier Constructor.

parameterdescription.para: cell-array of IvGraphic objects, or the number of alternatives
evidence threshld (scalar, or vector with 1 per alternative)
time, in seconds, before forcing a choice
number of gaze samples to store
amount of time (secs) before starting to ramp evidence-weighting on

briefdescription.para: IvClassifier Destructor.
Start accruing evidence towards each alternative.
Update evidence.
Get current status code.
Convenience wrapper for: obj.status == obj.STATUS_UNDECIDED.

simplesect.para: isund if classifier is still undecided

briefdescription.para: Make an (optionally forced) response, based on current level of evidence (if unforced may return obj.NULL_OBJ).

simplesect.para: mostLikelyObj the most likely fixation object

briefdescription.para: Enable automatic PTB screen texture drawing, allowing the observer to see the classification area(s).
Disable automatic PTB screen texture drawing.
Update the current classification estimate, check if any evidence/time criteria have been reached (obj.STATUS_UNDECIDED if no decision yet reached).
Generic class for maintaining the level of evidence in favour of each potential Area of Interest. Provides methods for the user to query what is the most likely fixation target.

detaileddescription.para:
IvClassifier Abstract Methods
draw - Visualise classifier on a PTB OpenGL screen.
IvClassifier Methods
IvClassifier - Constructor.
start - Start accruing evidence towards each alternative.
update - Update evidence.
getStatus - Get current status code.
isUndecided - Convenience wrapper for: obj.status == obj.STATUS_UNDECIDED.
interogate - Make an (optionally forced) response, based on current level of evidence (if unforced may return obj.NULL_OBJ).
show - Enable automatic PTB screen texture drawing, allowing the observer to see the classification area(s).
hide - Disable automatic PTB screen texture drawing.
none Example

simplesect.para: This class has the class property Abstract and needs to be inherited in order to be instantiable.
